timeline.message:
Shutdown gRPC channels cleanly

Several fixes
- closing channels doesn't happen imediatelly - added awatTermination
- Server stored in local variable not shutdown at end of test
- onCompleted should call onCompleted on responseObserver

timeline.bodyText: what happens if times out 5 seconds?
timeline.author: cangencer

replies.bodyText:
Ha! I thought it throws TimeoutException, but it just returns true/false if it managed to shutdown in time.
What should we do? Throw the exception ourselves?
replies.author: frant-hartm

replies.bodyText: is there some way to terminate it not so gracefully?
replies.author: cangencer

timeline.message:
Add forceful shutdown when normal shutdown doesn't terminate.
Extract shutdown to GrpcUtil.

timeline.bodyText: it would be better to use the logger from ctx, you can do this by making createContextFn return tuple2(channel, logger) , kind of ugly, but it should be fine.
